description.@en: Legal informants and other underworld associates share random information with you freely for the benefits they may yield at a later time. Assembling these dissonant parts, your mind can weave them together to provide significant leverage when the time is right.

effect.@en: At any time, you may spend 1 Fortune Point (or 1 Reputation Point if your GM is using these alternative rules) to gain a critical piece of information from underworld contacts, rumormongers or other sources. Reputation Points and their use can be found in Chapter 11: Game Mastery.
